blocks.name: ntrivcvg
blocks.content: A non-trivially converging infinite product converges. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ntrivcvg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c2, wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)), wrex(s0, c2, wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))))))
  rexlimdva(s0, c2, w0, wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)))), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)))
  exlimdv(s1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)))
  adantld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)))
  mpcom(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))))
  ad2antlr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))))
  eleq2s(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cuz, c0), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))))
  uzm1(cv(s0), c0)
  jaoi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)), wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli))))
  adantld(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)))
  syl6bi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)), wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)))
  breq1d(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1), cseq(c0, cmul, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  seqeq1(cv(s0), c0, cmul, c1)
  breldm(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))
  vex(s1)
  eleq2s(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0), c2, wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli))))
  expcom(wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)))
  an32s(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)))
  syl(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2)), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)), wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cli, co(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cv(s1))))
  clim2prod(s2, c0, c1, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s1), c2, wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2)), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))))
  simplr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)))
  ad5ant15(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), c2), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cc))
  biimpar(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2)), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)), wbr(cseq(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)))
  breq1d(cseq(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1), cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2)))
  seqeq1d(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cmul, c1, cv(s0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2)))
  npcand(cv(s0), nat1, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2)))
  zcnd(cv(s0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2)))
  sseldi(cv(s0), cz, c2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2)))
  eqsstri(c2, cz, cfv(cuz, c0))
  uzssz(c0)
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2))
  1cnd(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2)))
  breldm(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cli, co(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cv(s1)))
  seqex(c0, cmul, c1)
  ovex(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), cmul, cv(s1))
  eqcomi(cfv(cuz, c0), c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli))
  diff.cseq.s(s0, c0, cmul, c1)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, cli)
  diff.cli.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli))
  diff.cseq.s(s1, c0, cmul, c1)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cli)
  diff.cli.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2)), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)))
  diff.wa.s(s2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2))
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), c2)
  diff.co.s(s2, cv(s0), cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s2)
  diff.nat1.s(s2)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))
  diff.cseq.s(s2, cv(s0), cmul, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s2)
  diff.cli.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: ntrivcvgn0
blocks.content: A product that converges to a nonzero value converges non-trivially. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ntrivcvgn0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c3, nat0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))))), wcel(c2, c0), wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)))))
  syl6eleqr(c2, c0, cfv(cuz, c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(c2, cz))
  uzid(c2)
  elabd(s1, c3, w0, wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))), wa(wne(c3, nat0), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, c3)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, universe), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, c3))
  brrelex2i(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, c3)
  climrel()
  jca(w0, wne(c3, nat0), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, c3))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c3), wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)), wne(c3, nat0), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, c3))
  neeq1(cv(s1), c3, nat0)
  breq2(cv(s1), c3, cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli)
  rspcev(s0, c2, c0, wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)))), wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)))))
  exbidv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c2), wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))), wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)))
  breq1d(cseq(cv(s0), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1), cseq(c2, cmul, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  seqeq1(cv(s0), c2, cmul, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wne(c3, nat0), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, c3))
  diff.wne.s(s1, c3, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, c3)
  diff.cseq.s(s1, c2, cmul, c1)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.cli.s(s1)
  diff.wex.s(s0, s1, wa(wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wne(cv(s1), nat0), wbr(cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1)))
  diff.wne.s(s0, cv(s1), nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cseq(c2, cmul, c1), cli, cv(s1))
  diff.cseq.s(s0, c2, cmul, c1)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cli.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ntrivcvgn0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1,(s1 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(s0(×, c1))[~~>]s1))))
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ≠ 0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1,(s1 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(s0(×, c1))[~~>]s1))), c2 ∈ c0, ∃(s1,(s1 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]s1)))
  syl6eleqr(c2, c0, (ℤ≥ ` c2), w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2), c2 ∈ ℤ)
  uzid(c2)
  elabd(s1, c3, w0, (s1 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]s1), (c3 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]c3))
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ 𝕌, seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]c3)
  brrelex2i(seq(c2(×, c1)), cli, c3)
  climrel()
  jca(w0, c3 ≠ 0, seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]c3)
  anbi12d(s1 = c3, s1 ≠ 0, seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]s1, c3 ≠ 0, seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]c3)
  neeq1(s1, c3, nat0)
  breq2(s1, c3, seq(c2(×, c1)), cli)
  rspcev(s0, c2, c0, ∃(s1,(s1 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]s1)), ∃(s1,(s1 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(s0(×, c1))[~~>]s1)))
  exbidv(s1, s0 = c2, (s1 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(s0(×, c1))[~~>]s1), (s1 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]s1))
  anbi2d(s0 = c2, s1 ≠ 0, seq(s0(×, c1))[~~>]s1, seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]s1)
  breq1d(seq(s0(×, c1)), cli, s1, seq(c2(×, c1)), s0 = c2)
  seqeq1(s0, c2, cmul, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c3 ≠ 0, seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]c3)
  diff.wne.s(s1, c3, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, seq(c2(×, c1)), cli, c3)
  diff.cseq.s(s1, c2, cmul, c1)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.cli.s(s1)
  diff.wex.s(s0, s1, (s1 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]s1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, s1 ≠ 0, seq(c2(×, c1))[~~>]s1)
  diff.wne.s(s0, s1, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, seq(c2(×, c1)), cli, s1)
  diff.cseq.s(s0, c2, cmul, c1)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cli.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: ntrivcvgfvn0
blocks.content: Any value of a product sequence that converges to a nonzero value is itself nonzero. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 20-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ntrivcvgfvn0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cli, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c4, nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wne(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0), wne(c4, nat0))
  necon3d(c4, nat0, cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0, w0)
  ex(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0), wceq(c4, nat0))
  eqtr3d(c4, nat0, cfv(cli, cseq(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0), wceq(cfv(cli, cseq(c0, cmul, c1)), c4))
  mpsyl(w0, wceq(cfv(cli, cseq(c0, cmul, c1)), c4), wfun(cli), wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cli, c4))
  funbrfv(cli, cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c4)
  mpsyl(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cli, cseq(c0, cmul, c1)), nat0), wfun(cli), wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cli, nat0))
  ax-mp(wfun(cli), wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc))
  fclim()
  ffun(cli, cdm(cli), cc)
  climconst(s0, cseq(c0, cmul, c1), nat0, cfv(cuz, c2), c2, universe, wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)))
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c2))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0), wcel(c2, cz))
  sseldi(c2, cz, c3, w0)
  eqsstri(c3, cz, cfv(cuz, c0))
  uzssz(c0)
  a1i(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), universe))
  seqex(c0, cmul, c1)
  0cnd(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)))
  impcom(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cv(s0)), nat0))
  uzind4i(hs0, hs1, cv(s0), c2, wi(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cv(s0)), nat0)), wi(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cv(hs0)), nat0)), wi(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)), wi(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cv(hs1)), nat0)), wi(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), nat0)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), nat0))

  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0)→(c7 ` s2)∈ ℂ)

  ⊣ (w0 → c3[≤]c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0)→(c1 ` s2)=((c7 ` s2)[×](c8 ` s2)))
